author: NASS
description:
I colorized , restored and applied face restoration and created a sound design for this video of New York Late 1940s, takes us deep into the heart of the East Side—a neighborhood full of energy, diversity, and postwar character. From busy sidewalks to open market stalls, every frame captures the spirit of everyday life in one of Manhattan’s most vibrant districts


Video Restoration Process:
✔ FPS boosted to 60 frames per second 
✔ Image resolution boosted up to HD 
✔ Improved video sharpness and brightness 
✔ Colorized only for the ambiance (not historically accurate)
✔added sound only for the ambiance
✔restoration:(stabilisation,denoise,cleand,deblur) 



B&W Video Source: US National Archives

Please, be aware that colorization colors are not real and fake, colorization was made only for the ambiance and do not represent real historical data.

title: Life in 1940s New York | Rare Color [60fps,Remastered] w/sound design added
